g3dsys.control

Class G3DSys

  • java.lang.Object
    • g3dsys.control.G3DSys

  • public class G3DSys
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstraction and delegation container class to facilitate communication between the CoordMapper, FigureManager, and G3DPanel without deeply coupling them in their own definitions. Users need only instantiate G3DSys with the target AWT component and then start adding Figures for them to appear. No Figure constructors should be called directly, as the addFig method will do that itself based on the figure type argument (e.g.; BALL, LINE, BOX).
